entry.title: Underground Volumes: New Album
entry.content:
14 Tracks by Dylan Elliott / 05.06.2023

below: Streaming Links , Tracklist, + More

Available for purchase on Bandcamp
Streaming right now: Spotify //Apple Music
Soundcloud Link - Soundcloud
Link to All Music: Music - Dylan Elliott
Prepare for an audio experience unlike any other. We proudly present “Underground Volumes” by Atlanta-based producer and DJ, Dylan Elliott. This 14-track collection of minimalist beats and cyber melodies promises to take your musical journey to the next level.


Please enjoy these tunes + the mixing /mastering tricks.
-DE Underground Volumes Album Artwork (ai generated)

Run Time : 36min 07sec
Track List:

  1. Panther House
  2. Terminator House
  3. Arcade Levels
  4. Moon Bass (CyberClub)
  5. Cafe Shop Muzak
  6. Warehouse02
  7. OwnVenue
  8. LaserAftersHouse
  9. Geometry
  10. 90s Computer Virus
  11. Counting Dub
  12. Tek Noire
  13. Unique NewYork
  14. Damascus Pattern

Other Ai Bonus Material

Ai artwork created for Undergrond Volumes:
..++..++ New Project by Dylan Elliott. 2021-2023 Catalog. This is an Instrumental Album that contains the perfect vibe for Driving, Working Out, Hiking, etc.

Special thanks to all my friends and family that support me. Ai art created with OpenAi. Glitch visuals created using method by Paketa12
Underground Volumes - Dylan Elliott

entry.title: T-Shirts / Drôle EP
entry.content:
collab/ 30 Rare Tees with Attack Anxiety

Available at this link

Dylan Elliott creative thinker renowned artist known hoax New Music EP “Drôle” out now on all streaming platforms 2021, available to listen.

Merchandise for Dylan Elliott latest EP “Drôle”. Only 30 Shirts made, S-XXL. Cover of EP on 5.3oz White Cotton T-Shirt. Regular Fit. Tag features hand written number out of 30. Comes with a sticker.

Free shipping in US. International shipping $25. Will ship in 1-2 weeks. Made by Clance.

Special thanks to clance from attack anxiety
entry.summary: collab/ 30 Rare Tees with Attack Anxiety Available at this link
